metadata.title: CVE-2023-40283 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - high
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in l2cap_sock_release in net/bluetooth/l2cap_sock.cin the Linux kernel before 6.4.10. There is a use-after-free because thechildren of an sk are mishandled.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-40283` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-163-generic - 5.4.0-163.180
linux-image-5.4.0-163-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-163.180
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-163-generic - 5.4.0-163.180
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-163-lowlatency - 5.4.0-163.180
No subscription required

linux-image-5.15.0-84-generic - 5.15.0-84.93~20.04.1
linux-image-5.15.0-84-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-84.93~20.04.1
